duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish, build, and maintain customer relations through constant communication, and case coverage in the assigned territory.
Serve as the backup contact for the Territory Sales Reps.
Provide field sales support within an assigned geography while developing to become a Sales Representative.
Maintain expert knowledge of Sports Medicine products.
Increase territory results by building and maintaining strong business relationships.
Support compliance and the principles of responsibility (AdvaMed) by maintaining the privacy and confidentiality of information.
Work extended, off-normal work hours with flexibility in being able to adjust personal schedule.
Participate in and attend sales meetings and professional association meetings outside of regular business hours, as required.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA in relevant field preferred or 2+ years equivalent demonstrated sales experience.
